direction.raw_text: maybe 5'9" -- You can't be sure, you know the flippers, they add height or they take it away, or something.  Anyway short dark hair... Not punk or anything, just short. And the cutest smile.  He wasn't smiling at me, I don't think -- just smiling.  And he thought he saw me in the lake.  I mean that was a figure of speech... They're so romantic, the French.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you said he was Peruvian?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haven't you been listening? SALLY opens the drapes, revealing it's dawn outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Since eight o'clock last night...!  You're in love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be a jerk. (emphatically) There's no such thing as love at first sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : UNDERWATER - SWIMMING POOL JACQUES is swimming alone at the bottom of a gigantic swimming pool.  He wears a monofin, his head and chest are wired up to an assistant who runs back and forth alongside the pool. A man's feet are seen walking over to the side of the pool. JACQUES is swimming laps, arching his body like a dolphin. As he approaches one end of the pool, he sees a coin slowly falling in front of him.  JACQUES picks it up and looks at it:  it's an old Greek coin. JACQUES smiles and swims to the surface. EXT.  ON SIDE OF SWIMMING POOL - DAY JACQUES pokes his head out of the water and pulls off his goggles. ENZO stands over him, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques, my friend, how are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo... A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I leave you swimming and twenty years later, you're still in the water!  What the hell are you doing? Training?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. An uneasiness sweeps over ENZO'S face and quickly disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's good. (smiling again) You never would have recognized me, huh?  Check out the suit!  Looking good, no?  You know I'm the world champion?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dove 315 feet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They say I'm like Lazarus.  You know, the guy who was raised from the dead?! He laughs.  JACQUES smiles.  ENZO goes on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't it surprise you that I just show up like this... Listen, the world championship starts in ten days in Taormina.  Be my guest. ENZO puts down an airplane ticket on the side of the pool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your ticket. Surprised, JACQUES looks over at the ticket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I'm sure you're dying to beat me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to be in any competition... I dive because I like to, not to beat a record... don't you have to be very mad at somebody to want to beat him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  All you need is to want to be the best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're the best, Enzo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's too easy!  Every time I beat a record there's always some dumbshit asking me:  "D'you know that French guy, Mayol?  He's supposed to be very good!  Too bad he doesn't compete." So, you're going to come with me to Taormina! First, because you're my friend and second, because you don't have one reason to keep on spoiling my pleasure. (he pushes the airplane ticket to Jacques) ... I'll see you there... EXT.  OFFICE BUILDING - NEW YORK - DAY INT.  DUFFY'S OFFICE - DUFFY - JOHANA She is seated across the desk from him.  He's reading through her report.  Behind him, outside the large plate glass window, window-washers are seated on a scaffold suspended far above the city.  They eat lunch. JOHANA'S eyes wander (bored) around the office as DUFFY reads.  He looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is good work... unfortunately it's incomplete. (he glances at the window) Could you eat a sandwich 40 floors above the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johana, am I boring you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.  Of course not, definitely not... well, maybe a little.  What did you say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said that the file is incomplete. See if you can get through to this Lawrence character and have him send the Peruvian registration for his missing truck... and don't let him tell you it was in the glove compartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right Chief! She starts out of the office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did the driver really freeze?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a popsicle.  They're keeping him on a stick until spring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My God!  I'm glad I didn't go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... So am I. INT.  QUONSET HUT - PERU - DAY Doctor LAWRENCE covers one ear with his hand as he yells into the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I said, all the truck papers are in the glove compartment! INT.  JOHANA'S OFFICE - MANHATTAN JOHANA sits at her desk, she too is yelling into the telephone.  Her colleague looks over at her and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, listen, just get the custom's office to send me a copy as fast as possible.  We can't send you new equipment until our file is complete.  Okay? INT.  QUONSET HUT - PERU - DAY LAWRENCE Okay, okay.  You'll have it by the end of the week, how's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've made me a happy insurance person.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then, goodbye. He is just about to hang up. INT.  JOHANA'S OFFICE - MANHATTAN JOHANA jumps up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!  Professor...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Yes? JOHANA starts snooping around the papers on her desk, embarrassed by the presence of her colleague.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know how I could reach that diver of yours... Mayol... We need some additional information... I mean, we have a few questions to ask him. INT.  QUONSET HUT - PERU - DAY LAWRENCE The last thing I heard, he was off to Taormina for the world diving championships.  That's Taormina, in Sicily! INT.  DUFFY'S OFFICE - DAY JOHANA dashes in without knocking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, I just found out we've got real problems in Sicily!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What d'you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mafia!  La Cosa Nostra! Coppola!  De Niro...!  I knew it!  I knew we shouldn't have written that policy!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happened??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The documents are forged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!  The notary is a phony.  He has the same signature as the contractor!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It can't be true!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to send somebody over there immediately!  If we prove the forgery we can cancel the policy. We'll be off the hook.  There's a flight to Rome in two hours and from there its just a short hop to Sicily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll send Cardoza, he'll be able to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried him, he can't go.  His son is being Bar Mitzvohed tomorrow... I'll go, boss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought it was Spanish that you spoke?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Italian is practically the same thing. EXT.  PORT OF MESSINE - DAY A ferry comes into the dock, as a plank is slowly lowered. As it descends, four rail cars lie in wait in its belly. JOHANA comes off the boat, carrying her suitcase, she wears a light summer dress.  She looks around, seeming a little lost. A white FIAT taxi screeches to a halt beside her.  JOHANA jumps.  The driver whose arm loosely dangles from the car window, grins at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Taxi? EXT.  SAN DOMENICO - DAY The white FIAT taxi pulls up in front of the SAN DOMENICO hotel, but it is JACQUES who gets out of it.  The driver helps him with his bags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mayol... Mayol... No reservation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Are you sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Positive, Sir. JACQUES looks down at the piece of paper stapled to his ticket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the hotel San Domenico?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes Sir, and it has been so for 127 years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but... So, you haven't got a room left?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No Sir, the hotel is full because of the Diving championship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah?! The Receptionist starts working on his papers again. JACQUES, completely lost, stares blankly at the hotel clerk, wondering what to do next. INT.  HOTEL - DAY The tiny FIAT clatters onto the sidewalk in front of the hotel narrowly avoiding the Countess' limo.  Parks its frontwheels on the sidewalk, rear end in the road. ENZO, followed by ROBERTO, get out of his car, like a king descending from his carriage.  On the way, he stops and kisses a distinguished elderly woman's hand?  The hotel's CONTESSA. ENZO tosses his keys to a doorman who stepped up to complain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful with that car, it's a new paint job. ENZO enters the hotel and sees JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Giacomino!  My friend!  My brother! ENZO and JACQUES.  The two men kiss each other on both cheeks, pound each others back.  They are both moved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you finally decided to join us? You did the right thing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Paolo!  Come stai?  Get my key! (to Jacques, gesturing over his shoulder) You remember my little brother Roberto? Roberto (26) nods to JACQUES who shakes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember.  Hi Roberto!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What room have you got?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have a room? (at the top of his lungs) Paolo?  What did I just hear?  I personally called you to reserve a room for my good friend Jacques Mayol and you treat him like a stranger?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, Enzo.  I'll go somewhere else.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not only is Jacques Mayol a very special friend, but he happens to be one of the best divers in the world! And you're throwing him out!  Are you crazy, or what?  Stupido!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo drop it, I'll find something. ENZO looks at him for a moment and gives him a warm smile. He hands him his own keys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take mine.  I'll take the Countess' suite.  She told me she was leaving for the cemetery... She'll be more comfortable there. PAOLO half-heartedly, hands him the key.  ENZO glances at JACQUES to make sure he's properly impressed.  He throws his arm around JACQUES' shoulder, hugs him and gives him a real smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you're here. EXT.  HOTEL TERRACE TAORMINA - JACQUES - ENZO - DAY They're at a table on a terrace that overlooks the sea. They've just arrived and all around them people are lunching away furiously. ENZO beckons to a passing WAITER who comes to the table. He's a very handsome, slightly effeminate young man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Spaghetti del mare" (to Jacques) It's delicious here.  It's the one thing they really know how to make.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Del mare for two?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sure, for two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And a bottle of "Frascatti".  Two bottles!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Si Signore, grazie mille. The waiter hurries away.  ENZO watches his departure, then thoughtfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He moves just like a woman. (then, as if he were speaking to Jacques) It must be hard to live in two worlds like that, huh?  To breathe in one, swim in the other... JACQUES nods without really knowing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway!  Nothing beats a sexy broad! Huh, Jacques! ENZO starts laughing.  JACQUES would like to crawl under the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT.  HOTEL TERRACE TAORMINA - JACQUES - ENZO - LATER Their lunch is on the table, half eaten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... So, after all these years, you must have lots of questions to ask. Am I right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, of course.  Lots of questions. JACQUES is satisfied with his answer.  He thinks that the subject is closed.  They eat silently for a moment.  ENZO watches him.  Then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry... I don't know how to ask the questions. ENZO bursts out laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then.  I'll do the asking for you.  "Tell me dear Enzo, how did you become World Champion?"  Oh, that's a long story. (his voice changes) Well, after you left Amorgos, I went back to Italy and joined the Navy. So you now have in front of you -- Captain Molinari, who's been on leave of absence for the past 14 years...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you make a living?  Your experiments, does it pay well?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... You married? JACQUES doesn't seem to have ever thought about marriage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me neither, 'cause of my Mother. She's a curse, my Mamma, a tornado. Stubborn as a mule!  I was engaged... for a week.  After that, Mamma was so mad, I tell you, pasta was bouncing off the walls. JACQUES smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, not married.  Well, good for you.  You play the field, like me. A girl in every port, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly, I mean, after all, we're men!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn right!  That's what I tell them when people say you've turned into a fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People say that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it.  I was joking. EXT.  ENTRANCE TO TERRACE - ON JOHANA JOHANA comes out of the stone tunnel which leads to the terrace.  She looks over the crowd, trying to find someone. JACQUES is sitting with his back to her.  She finally spots him and walks over to the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh!  La Madonna!  This one is for me.  I'll bet you my watch that she's in my bed tonight. JACQUES turns around and recognizes her.  JOHANA smiles and walks up to the table.  ENZO takes his watch off and puts it on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tell you she's mine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know each other?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo Molinari. ENZO kisses her hand and brushes his watch off the table in the same movement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a great pleasure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johana Cross, pleased to meet you. (then to Jacques, faking surprise) Well!  Isn't this a coincidence.  I really wasn't expecting this... All the way out here.  It's incredible!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, have a seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.  I wouldn't want to interrupt anything. JOHANA sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not at all!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're staying at the hotel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish, but it's full.  They recommended a pension in town.  They say that all of Taormina is full. What's going on here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the Free Diving World Championship.  I am by the way world champion! JOHANA has turned toward JACQUES, paying no attention to ENZO.  JACQUES can't stop looking at JOHANA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what brought you to Sicily?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was doing an insurance investigation in Palermo. (to Enzo) I work for an insurance company. (back to Jacques) So, I decided to take a few days off. (uncomfortable) I don't know this island at all.  It really is gorgeous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is no place in the world more beautiful than Sicily! The waiter passes behind them.  ENZO reaches out, grabs him by the arm, pulls him to the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A spaghetti del mare for the super dedicated traveling insurance agent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I'll have a coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no.  You'll like it.  It's superb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Okay.  I'll try. ENZO pours the wine. JOHANA shrugs fatalistically.  The waiter leaves. JACQUES, intrigued, stares at JOHANA.  She pretends not to notice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you two meet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a lake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I might have known. (to Johana) As I was telling you earlier, I'm the world champion free diver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some people say it's the most virile sport in the world.  One has to admit that when you see those men diving head first in that deep blue sea, all muscles contracted in one super human effort...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mother?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahi, ahi, cazzo!  Ma mamia! Where...?  God, she'll kill me... (pushing the plate in front of Johana) ... if she catches me eating pasta in a restaurant. He quickly brushes off the crumbs in front of him. ON ENZO'S MOTHER heading toward them.  She's a huge woman in widow's black. She shoulders her way through the tables. ROBERTO carrying her suitcases follows at her heels. ENZO jumps to his feet.  Throws his arms around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Mamma!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You expect me to carry all the luggage myself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mamma.  Roberto and an elevator... Isn't that enough? A beat.  Signora MOLINARI inspects the plates on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What have you been eating?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coffee only, I'm diving tomorrow. You remember little Jacques, Jacques Mayol...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Madame...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... And his friend, Johana... Signora MOLINARI nods grudgingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spaghetti del mare! Dead silence. ENZO is the only one with no plate in front of him. Signora MOLINARI'S eyebrows condense into a dark stripe across her forehead. JOHANA hands ENZO'S plate to the WAITER and takes the full one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. And begins to eat, ignoring the expressions of amazement all around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Americana? JOHANA nods enthusiastically, her mouth too full to speak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Benvenuto! MAMMA MOLINARI has a huge grin on her face. EXT.  TAORMINA STREET - JACQUES, JOHANA - TWILIGHT They emerge onto the street in front of the entrance of a small rooming house. JACQUES is carrying JOHANA'S luggage.  The old pension is covered in bright pink bougainvilliers, there is laundry hanging on the other side of the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for helping with the bag. (she looks up at the pension with little enthusiasm) It looks great!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought it was a nice place. (suddenly doubting) Isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm being a pain in the ass. (looking at him) It's beautiful here. They look at each other.  JACQUES is silent.  He just stands there, a suitcase in each hand. JOHANA breaks the silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to be very busy these days aren't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just because... I would have liked to visit the town... See the coast... I don't know anybody... Expect for you. (feeling she has gone too far) But you are going to be very busy. You must have tons of things to prepare, interviews... And a competition like this one must require a great deal of concentration, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... Maybe... I don't know.  I don't like competitions... It ruins the fun.  Don't you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess... But you know... I'm American and I've mostly been taught to be competitive... There's always pleasure of being the best?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe on earth there is one... but not when you dive... You see, to dive deep into the sea, for no reason... just to do it.  It's a feeling... I don't know how to say this... Voluptuous? He looks up at her as he pronounces the last word.  She smiles at him, lovingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can put down the suitcases, you know. He lets go of the suitcases.  Suddenly, behind them, there is a loud screech of tires.  The FIAT tears across the street. ENZO in his FIAT.  He pokes his head out of the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, you two... Jacques, we have to get ready for the ceremony tonight.  We have a new world champion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a little tired, I don't know if...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get in the car! INT.  ENZO'S SUITE - ENZO, JACQUES, ROBERTO - NIGHT They're in front of a wardrobe looking JACQUES over in the full-length mirrors.  He's wearing an evening shirt and a tuxedo of ENZO'S.  The collar is too big, the sleeves hangover his hands.  He looks at himself dubiously in the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roberto!  The bow-tie! ROBERTO hands ENZO the bow-tie, he hooks it around JACQUES' collar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very good. JACQUES looks down at his tennis shoes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the shoes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very chic. (hesitates) Anyway, you don't have anything else, do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then, it's very chic.  Avanti! EXT.  RECEPTION ON TERRACE - NIGHT A big reception is organized on the terrace of the hotel. The official divers and technicians are all gathered in front of a podium.  The terrace is loaded with photographers. ROBERTO keeps turning round and round the long buffet table. JACQUES is alone at the bar.  Incongruous detail:  a whiskey bottle on the table beside him. JOHANA enters.  She has also had a few drinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you'd be at the dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's too loud for me. He tugs at his over-sized tuxedo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look adorable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Especially the sneakers. JACQUES looks down at his feet, doesn't know what to make of her comment.  JOHANA sits down beside him and pours herself a drink.  They touch glasses. EXT.  ON PODIUM - NIGHT On the podium, NOVELLI, the organizer of the championship, stands in his tuxedo, talking into a microphone.  An older man in a worn out suit, stands next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies and Gentlemen, your attention, please.  Mr. Andre Bonnet, President of the International Diving Championship Committee, is going to present this trophy to the new world champion of free diving.  This afternoon, our new champion descended to the remarkable depth of 280 feet. The audience applauds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This young man Tia... NOVELLI can't quite read his notes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tiraro... Tirao-re... Moa... ANDRE BONNET takes his turn to read the note.  A young Tahitian jumps up, heads for the podium.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tiraero Moameora. NOVELLI hesitates to repeat the name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Let's all give him a big hand. The audience cheers and applauds the new champion.  ENZO sits at a table, watching the ceremony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A one day hero! He gets up and walks out of the room. INT.  BAR - NIGHT JACQUES and JOHANA are sitting at the bar.  The whiskeys have gone to their heads.  ENZO walks over to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A new world record!  That's great! It gives me something to beat tomorrow! (to Johana) You ever been to Tahiti?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take you there.  We'll live in the sun.  You'll cook fresh fish and we'll make love under the coconut trees. JOHANA smiles and shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You forgot the Hula!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, of course, I'll do the Hula!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll be lovely, but no thanks. (to Jacques) Jacques, would you do a native dance for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how... Excuse me. JACQUES leaves the bar.  JOHANA watches him go.  ENZO notices her way of watching him.  He's a little jealous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks strange, doesn't he?  Like a baby that just learned to walk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you known him long?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forever.  We used to live on the same island in Greece, when we were kids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was he like, when he was little?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little.  Very little.  And skinny, very skinny too.  That is compared to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I get it, Enzo you were a superior child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly!  What is it Johana?  You're so crazy about him, you don't see the truth?! She doesn't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it, don't think of Jacques as a human being.  He's from another world. She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And just where are you from?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Italy! EXT.  TERRACE OF THE HOTEL - NIGHT ENZO sits at the grand piano in the corner of the terrace. Beethoven was always a favorite of his. JACQUES, very tipsy by now walks over, a glass in each hand.  He hands ENZO a glass, then takes off his tennis shoes and sits them neatly on the piano.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is nothing like music.  It speaks from the heart.  Can you tell me why we bother diving in the dark, the cold, without ever taking the time to breathe?  Huh?  Can you tell me why we do it? JACQUES nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... For the mermaids. ENZO smiles, moved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father used to see them everywhere too... but the only one he ever caught was my mother... Actually she caught him. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Today at lunch, you asked me if I had any questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah ha.  You finally want to know about women.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?  Are they what's most important?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... It depends... Sometimes they are... What, exactly do you want to know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything about what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... about everything. ENZO grins at JACQUES and starts playing again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : JACQUES AND ENZO There are now several empty champagne bottles around. They are both quite drunk.  ENZO is philosophizing. JOHANA is looking for them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... So, between Mamma, Roberto and the sisters, we yell and scream all day long.  Except with Angelica. She just cries.  And then finally, we all end up kissing.  Can you explain that to me? JACQUES can't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because that's what love is all about.  It's a pain in the ass but keeps us together. (then, in a half dreaming, half desperate tone) A large and beautiful family! JOHANA walks over to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo... We must quit the competition. ENZO hits a wrong note on the piano.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we don't... I'm going to beat you. JOHANA stands next to JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?  Well listen to him! (to Johana) Do you hear that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks me in the eye like some fuckin' gold fish, and says:  "I'm going to beat you".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... That's what he's here for, isn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen to her!  "That's what he's here for"!  He's here to loose, that's what he's here for.  First of all, I'm unbeatable.  Second, how old are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two years younger than you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As I said, second of all you're too skinny.  You've got tiny lungs.  I still don't understand how you can dive without getting sick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The size of the lungs has nothing to do with it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at me.  These aren't lungs. These are... Tanks.  How long can you hold your breath? ENZO is getting really angry.  The drinks have a lot to do with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.  Longer than you. ENZO pulls open his collar and rises.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll see. EXT.  HOTEL - SWIMMING POOL - UNDERWATER - NIGHT JACQUES and ENZO dive into the pool in their Tuxedos. Each one carries a beach umbrella in a concrete base to help them stay at the bottom. ENZO takes two goblets out of his pocket, hands them to JACQUES.  Takes a bottle of Champagne out of the other pocket and opens it.  The cork floats out of the bottle. Above on the surface of the pool there's a splash.  JOHANA finds a mask on the side of the pool and watches them. Her dress is soaked by now. ENZO pours champagne.  Courteous and grave, they clink glasses and begin to drink.  They have already been underwater longer than a minute.  They can't really drink out of the glasses and ENZO offers JACQUES the bottle. JACQUES studies the label like a connoisseur.  He drinks, passes the bottle back to ENZO. INT.  HOTEL CORRIDOR - NIGHT Paramedics roll two stretchers toward the elevators at full speed.  ENZO on one, JACQUES on the other.  Both men keep throwing up water. INT.  JACQUES'S ROOM - NIGHT The paramedics roll the stretcher toward the bed. JOHANA very worried, follows them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it easy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, he's empty now.  He needs sleep, that's all. The two men leave the room. JOHANA walks over to the chair and rearranges JACQUES' shirt and jacket which the paramedic had thrown down. JACQUES looks like he's just had a very rough night.  He sits up and grabs the sides of the bed, as if he were on a moving boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who won? JOHANA turns around, furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Won what?  The Ass Hole Award? Well, let me tell you, it's a tie! She walks over to the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Acting like a pair of two year olds! You could have died in that damn pool!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please move slowly, you're rocking the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucky I was there to save you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You jumped in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only to help the medics, I assure you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My wallet. JOHANA wet, walks over to the wet clothes on the chair. She pulls out JACQUES soaking wallet from one of the jacket pockets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's still here. She tries to wipe it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  I want to show you.  Is it ruined?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, water isn't exactly the best thing for pictures... Not even for pictures of dolphins...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give it to me. JOHANA hands him the photograph.  He stares at it, looking very sad.  Worried JOHANA sits down next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My real family... (he looks at the picture and cries) What kind of man has such a family? She takes the picture out of his hands. He is so upset that JOHANA can hardly help from crying with him.  She sits next to him and strokes his hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sick of never feeling at home anywhere. JOHANA takes him in her arms.  He breaks down. EXT.  HOTEL - DAWN The early morning sun slowly lights up the water.  A yacht has left the hotel dock.  It is moving out to sea off the coast of TAORMINA. EXT.  YACHT - ON DECK This is the Committee Boat for the diving competition. On the boat, ROBERTO is worried.  He checks his watch and finally decides to wake up his brother.  ENZO is asleep in the fore peak, curled up on a coil of line, snoring away. He wears his tuxedo jacket over a skimpy bathing suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo, wake up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh?  Si!  Avanti! He gets up on one arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The medics are looking all over for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm meditating, can't you see? Jacques does two hours of yoga before going down.  I can take a five minute nap, can't I? The boat stops.  The anchor is thrown over board. The sailors, technicians and officials are getting ready for the competition.  Today is ENZO'S turn to dive.  A man is hooking a plaque indicating the depth (324 feet) onto a lead disk which he heaves into the water on a cable. INT.  YACHT - DOCTOR'S CABIN - DAY A medic is bending over ENZO, taking his blood pressure. ROBERTO pulls the tuxedo jacket down.  The doctor puts a blood pressure band around ENZO'S upper arm, pumps it up. He listens with his stethoscope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Molinari, I'm terribly sorry but I cannot allow you to dive in such an advanced state of exhaustion. ENZO jumps to his feet, grabs the doctor by his lapels, lifts him in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you know about the sea? Huh?  Nothing!  So you just put your tubes and tin cans away.  The sea is mine!  I know when she is ready for me and when she isn't.  And today, she is ready.  Understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You dive at your own risk.  You're been warned. ENZO smiles and pats the doctor on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brave. EXT.  YACHT - ON DIVING PLATFORM It's a large float, rigged to the stern of the Committee Boat.  ROBERTO and an assistant help ENZO down the swim ladder to the platform.  He's wearing a wet suit and fins. He flip-flops to the end of the platform. ROBERTO hands him his mask.  The goggles are filled with polystyrene to eliminate as much air pressure as possible. Only two pinholes to see through.  The mask fits tightly over his nose.  When ENZO puts it on, he looks like an astonished insect.  ENZO breathes faster and faster. ROBERTO holds the wire controlling the weighted diving apparatus.  ENZO crosses himself, takes a last long gulp of air. ROBERTO releases the weight.  It sinks and drags ENZO down, he quickly disappears into the dark water... BLACK AND WHITE But this is JACQUES as he was a child.  He swims along the bottom, finds and picks up a gold coin.  We can see its ancient markings, a youth on a dolphin. JACQUES looks up.  In front of him is a dolphin, floating vertically, still, apparently just watching.  JACQUES isn't scared anymore.  But every time he swims toward the dolphin, it moves further away.  It finally disappears. INT.  HOTEL ROOM - JACQUES - DAY He sits bolt upright in bed, awakened by his dream.  He looks around the room, trying to get his bearings. JOHANA is asleep in a chair across the room.  On the wall behind her, her last nights dress is drying on a hanger. She's wrapped up in a hotel bathrobe fast asleep. JACQUES finally awake from his dream, sees JOHANA sleeping.  He walks over to her, touches her shoulder. She wakes up, starts out of the chair.  She grabs the blanket to cover herself, and in doing so, a book falls on the floor.  It's one of his.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You scared me! JACQUES picks up the book.  JOHANA smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just checking up on your family. (then embarrassed) I guess I was drunker than I thought and the idea of going back to my hotel in a wet dress... Well...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you stayed.  Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd better get back now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You... You wouldn't want to spend the day with me? She sits back in her chair, amazed that he would even ask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?  Huh? (she says "No" as if she had asked the question) Yes, of course!! EXT.  MARINELAND - TAORMINA - DAY JACQUES and JOHANA enter the dolphinarium.  JOHANA is wearing an old pair of JACQUES SHORTS along with an oversized T-shirt and rolled up sweater.  She seems quite pleased with her new attire. JACQUES and JOHANA walk straight through MARINELAND and head toward the dolphin pool.  It's pretty crowded, mostly kids. The dolphins are lying motionless at the bottom of the pool.  The trainer is tired of throwing fish in the pool and getting absolutely no reaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand.  We've tried for two days.  They won't eat.  They won't perform.  It's since we got the new one. CLOSE ON DOLPHIN surfacing.  It thrusts its head over the edge of the pool, looks to JACQUES and SPEAKS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is she the new one? Surprised, the trainer nods. JOHANA looks over at JACQUES then at the dolphin.  She doesn't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you tell it's a female?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... The way she moves. Three other dolphins gather around the one that JACQUES is patting. JACQUES is staring at the female dolphin.  It looks like the animal is trying to tell him something.  Suddenly the dolphin grabs him by the sleeve and pulls him into the pool. UNDERWATER - DOLPHIN POOL JACQUES hangs onto the dolphin's muzzle.  Let's it pull him along.  The dolphin swims to a far corner of the pool, and pulls JACQUES to the bottom.  The other dolphins circle above. EXT.  DOLPHIN POOL - DAY JACQUES pops up.  As he does, three dolphins leap in the air behind him.  JOHANA walks closer to the pool.  She is so excited by what JACQUES is doing, she finally falls into the pool. After a while, JACQUES gets out of the pool and helps JOHANA out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you ever think of trying the public pool?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's a dolphin specialist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In that case what's wrong with the new one?  Is she sick or not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not the way you mean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I supposed to do?  Do I call the dealer...?  The investment, you understand... I certainly am entitled to complain!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's going to cost you more than you think! JACQUES turns around and walks off.  JOHANA catches up with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's not like the others.  She can't stand to be away from the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, I just feel it. INT.  HALL - HOTEL - DAY JACQUES and JOHANA are walking across the corridor. ENZO walks up to them, followed by his tribe.  Everybody is congratulating him. ROBERTO is screaming, MAMMA MOLINARI is crying.  ENZO smiles as he talks back to them.  He sees JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah!  Jacques! ENZO grabs hold of his shoulders.  JACQUES and JOHANA are completely soaked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be sad, I only took back what was mine. He gives JACQUES the diving plaque, it reads 280 feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, it's a present. JOHANA and JACQUES smile at each other.  JACQUES has won his bet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Thank you. ENZO slaps him on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tonight we're having a little party among ourselves.  8 o'clock in my suite?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. ENZO walks off then turns back toward them.  He whispers in JACQUES' ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me... Can you explain why you are soaking wet? A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... We're in training. ENZO walks off. INT.  HOTEL CORRIDOR - NIGHT Three formally dressed officials are waiting in front of one of the hotel rooms.  One of them holds a medal in his hand, a glass of champagne in the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Roberto, tell your brother to be reasonable.  Everyone is waiting for him upstairs.  The photographers are there, the press...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can't, he's indisposed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shall we call a doctor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's okay.  Mamma is going to try something. JACQUES and JOHANA walk up from the other side of the hall and stop in front of the same door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Mayol, help us.  He refuses to receive his medal and everybody is waiting for him up there.  We already have problems with the press because of the danger, and if we don't even have the divers help...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I'll do my best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's very kind of you. JACQUES knocks on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Jacques... Mayol! A beat.  Then ENZO opens the door himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques!  My friend!  Come on in! The officials look at each other baffled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Enzo Molinari, allow me to impress upon you the importance of your attending the Award Ceremony... For the press...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think my brother told you I was indisposed, that should do it, no? I'm allowed to be indisposed, right? So, you just tell the press that the "big" Enzo Molinari, overwhelmed by his inspiring descent to 324 feet, will not be able to receive this trinket because he is... He looks inquisitively at the three men.  ENZO looses his temper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because he is?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Indisposed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brave! He slams the door in their face. INT.  HOTEL - ENZO'S ROOM - NIGHT JACQUES Tell me, why don't you go and get your medal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because pasta should be eaten "Al Dente".  So the trinket will just have to wait a bit. ENZO takes JACQUES by the shoulder.  Inside his room is absolute chaos:  dancing, singing, eating.  Wet suits hung out to dry everywhere.  MAMMA MOLINARI is whipping up mountains of spaghetti on an improvised stove in the middle of the room.  A lot of smoke... steam... color... noise... All of Italy crammed into a few square feet. JOHANA taken in by the warm atmosphere, sits in a corner of the room.  JACQUES walks over and sits down at her side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mamma!  La pasta?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arrivo!  Arrivo! She points at ROBERTO who is taking forever to grate the cheese.  ENZO grabs the guitar from his other brother's hands and starts playing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... It's easy.  You go down.  You come up. (to Johana) ... Right, Johana?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations, Enzo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you agree, Jacques?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... You always were the best. ENZO laughs then sees his mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah!  La pasta! ENZO starts singing in Italian.  MAMMA MOLINARI serves the pasta, ROBERTO follows her around, sprinkling his cheese on the plates.  She serves JOHANA a huge plate of pasta, enough for three giants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buon appetito, Signorina! JOHANA who isn't even hungry, grins uncertainly.  JACQUES has walked up to ENZO.  He doesn't dare ask his question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter?  You still have a bunch of things to ask me?  You want to know the price of tea in China of how we landed on the moon?  Is that it? ENZO laughs.  JACQUES is serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I have to ask you a favor... (a beat) You're the only one who'll understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I'm listening. INT.  CORRIDOR - NIGHT MAMMA MOLINARI Tutto va bene? The three officials are eating pasta, plates on their knees.  Their mouths are too full to speak, they nod enthusiastically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gracie mille, chignora. MAMMA MOLINARI smiles and slams the door. INT.  FIAT - NIGHT JACQUES is driving, JOHANA sits beside him.  ENZO crammed in the back seat, very uncomfortably, because of a stretcher which takes up all the space. They are dressed as they were at ENZO'S party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!  Will you slow down!  When did you learn how to drive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Driving isn't the problem, it's remembering the right road. JACQUES runs a red light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the lights!  Running lights, stealing stretchers...!  You'll have us in jail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo, stop bitching, will you? EXT.  MARINELAND PARKING LOT - FIAT - NIGHT They get out of the car.  JACQUES starts to change into his swimming trunks.  ENZO shakes his head, can't believe he's really come along.  He laughs and starts undressing. INT./ EXT.  FIAT - STREET TAORMINA - NIGHT It's a very narrow street.  The car moves down it quickly. JACQUES drives.  The back seat is now occupied by the dolphin.  Its nose and tail protruding through the windows. JOHANA is in the front seat, turned around, spraying the dolphin with a watering can. EXT.  BEACH - NIGHT They have driven to the public beach.  They slowly lower the stretcher into the water.  The dolphin, leaving the stretcher, swims around a little but won't go away. He won't leave JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't stay here!  Come on!  Go away! JACQUES swims off with her for a while. ENZO walks back toward the car with the stretcher. JOHANA, standing by the water looks at JACQUES and the dolphin who are swimming off together. JACQUES keeps splashing the dolphin as they swim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can stop that now, she has all the water she needs. JACQUES cannot get rid of the dolphin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, we did it.  Let's go back to the party. JACQUES and the dolphin can't seem to part.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just one minute. JOHANA is worried, she walks up to ENZO who goes back into the water and takes JACQUES by the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques, the dolphin is home now. And that's where we're going.  Come on!  Hurry up now.  Our girlfriend is freezing over there. The dolphin starts swimming off.  JACQUES follows ENZO half-heartedly. EXT.  JOHANA'S PENSION - NIGHT ENZO stops the FIAT in front of the pension.  The three of them get out.  ENZO hasn't bothered to dress. JOHANA heads for the gate, she obviously has no desire of leaving JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, good night, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You going to sleep here, all by yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... She looks over at the pension, having a hard time concealing her lack of enthusiasm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... It's a comfortable place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sinister is what I'd call it...! Ours is so much cheerful!  Why don't you come and stay with me... There's plenty of room in my suite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mamma's there too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, the Mamma is is there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night Enzo, Good night Jacques.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't need a stretcher to take her with you.  You know that, don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The dolphins aren't the only ones who don't feel very good sometimes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave it alone, Enzo, it's okay. She rings the bell for the concierge, then looks back at JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I come watch you dive tomorrow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... Yes, of course! The concierge comes out and opens the iron gate for her. JOHANA disappears into the parc.  ENZO turns to JACQUES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really do have a few things to learn about women! EXT.  SEA - DAY The sun is rising on a rough sea.  The Committee Boat is anchored in the open sea, 600 feet above the sea bed. EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT - BAY OF TAORMINA - DAY JACQUES who is on the foredeck of a boat at sea has just laid a towel down before him.  He's suited up, sitting in the lotus position, staring straight ahead, clearly self- hypnotized. JOHANA, NOVELLI, and other officials are in the stern of the boat watching last minute preparations. The scuba divers in brightly colored wetsuits and aqualungs, flop out onto the diving platform, plunge into the water, disappear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are they for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're paramedics.  They wait at
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (with a tense grin on his face)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If there was a problem, they could do something right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course, that's what they're for. JOHANA sees scuba divers with weird air tanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... And those?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those are the divers who go down 300 to 330 feet.  They dive with a Helium-oxygen mixture.  At that depth, compressed air is too dangerous because it contains carbon dioxide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that little air bottle on the machine?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That isn't for the divers actually. It's for the balloon.  It blows up and pulls the diver up like an elevator.  Without it, with the pressure at the bottom, the diver would just stay pinned to the sea bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But doesn't Jacques dive without anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... It's magic. INT.  BOAT - DAY - LATER On the boat, NOVELLI checks his watch.  JACQUES comes out of his room.  He's dressed to dive.  He ignores everyone as he goes down the ladder to the diving platform.  He seems to be in another world.  All sounds coming to him are drowned out. EXT.  DIVING PLATFORM - DAY JACQUES sits in the diver's slot.  Opens his eyes slowly and looks around.  He puts his flippers on, an assistant stands at his side. HIS POV The figures on the platform are vague, the VOICES are GARBLED and incomprehensible.  Moving almost in slow motion he raises three fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tre minuti! BACK TO SCENE Ten other divers have waited for this signal to dive. They disappear one by one into the blue. JACQUES uses contact lenses instead of a mask.  He puts them in, and now, his view of the world is as distorted as his hearing... bodies deform... sounds fade... Already euphoric from the vast amount of oxygen in his system, he moves into another reality altogether... seems to empty himself out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Due minuti! JACQUES fills a small tube with water.  Pours it into his nostrils... tilts his head... then lets it run out... He puts on his gloves... all his movements are slow, he seems to be operating in a different time zone... He seems unable to take his eyes off the water. EXT.  END OF DIVING PLATFORM - DAY TECHNICIAN Uno minuto! JACQUES puts his nose clip on.  He puts his hand on the gueuse.  Closes his eyes and inhales slowly.  Then he takes a sudden last breath, nods, the technician releases the gueuse and in one flashing movement, he disappears. UNDERWATER The gueuse slides down the cable.  JACQUES hangs on like a ribbon in the wind, past a marker, 90 feet down. Above him, the boat disappears from sight. He moves faster and faster... through a sea that looks like a cloudy sky.  The light fades rapidly around him. Below, white spotlights pierce an ocean dark as night. JACQUES reaches them in a matter of seconds.  Turns the brakes, brings his machine to a halt, 180 feet down. The medics are waiting for him there.  They take his pulse.  Check his eyes... 15 seconds... normal... the bubbles from there scuba tanks churn the water around them... JACQUES closes his eyes... a tap on the shoulder, he releases the brake on the gueuse.  Plunges further, this time into pitch black. Below him a faint spotlight glows on the bottom.  He reaches it and the dark diver moves to him.  JACQUES brakes his machine.  Moving very slowly, turns his body right side up.  Like a sleep walker, JACQUES starts to take the plaque off the plumbline... pauses in the middle of the gesture. The dark diver flashes the high sign to JACQUES, thumb and forefinger touching, fingers extended, all clear.  JACQUES does not respond.  The diver repeats the signal.  JACQUES does not respond. The diver taps JACQUES on the shoulder... a beat... and then JACQUES responds, thumb and forefinger touching okay. Slowly, reluctantly, he wraps his hand around the handle of the balloon. The dark diver quickly turns the handle for him.  The balloon inflates.  JACQUES hangs on... lets it carry him up. At the plague marking 210 feet, JACQUES lets go of the the balloon.  With a burst of speed, it darts toward the surface. JACQUES follows slowly, undulating like a fish... He's getting warm now... He closes his eyes. Passes the medical control without stopping... without even seeing it like someone asleep. He's moving faster now, toward the warmth, toward the air. JACQUES opens his eyes, watches the lights grow brighter. The silhouette of the boat comes back into view.  60 feet to go. EXT.  DIVING PLATFORM - DAY In slow motion JACQUES' hand holding the plaque breaks out of the water followed by his arm, in one continuous movement, his shoulders and head. He gasps for air. A trickle of blood comes from his nose. Flashbulbs flicker, spectators cheer. EXT.  OPEN SEA - A DOLPHIN The dolphin, the one rescued last night, leaps into the air, in perfect harmony with JACQUES' triumph. EXT.  DOLPHINARIUM The dolphins in the dolphinarium leap into the air at the exact same moment. The trainer doesn't understand what's going on. EXT.  DIVING PLATFORM - DAY JACQUES falls back into the water.  Two divers run over and pull him up onto the dock. JACQUES seems completely dazed, almost in a trance.  He slowly comes to and starts screaming louder and louder. It is the scream of his body in need of the surface, reality and the feel of the land. JOHANA is terrified.  She can hardly breathe.  Everybody applauds. EXT.  HOTEL DOCK - DAY JACQUES and JOHANA walk down the gangway.  NOVELLI has lead the way and the news has been spread. JACQUES looks very weak and punchy. JOHANA holds him up. The spectators applaud as he goes by.  Intrigued, JACQUES looks at them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques, listen to the applause. He doesn't respond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques, you set a world record.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aren't you happy?  Don't you feel proud...?  I feel proud and all I did was watch. He is staring at her, he's returning to the real world. Slowly he smiles. She grabs hold of his arm and gives him a proud kiss on the mouth.  JACQUES is a little stunned. EXT.  TERRACE - SWIMMING POOL - DAY ENZO walks into the hotel, his arms filled with packages. He sees JACQUES and JOHANA.  From the look on his face we can tell he knows that JACQUES has beaten his record.  He deliberately puts on a huge smile as he walks over to them. INT.  TERRACE - SWIMMING POOL ENZO Congratulations Jacques!  It's wonderful!  Wonderful! He drops his packages on the bar and gives Jacques a big hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm happy for you! He kisses him and starts handing out his presents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here... (to Johana) Here...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little presents, nothing much... I knew it, I just knew it!  Look here! He holds up his arm:  he is wearing two watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roberto's watch!  I won it!  He bet that you couldn't beat me! JACQUES opens his present.  It's a little ceramic dolphin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You still collect them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have that one, do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  Thank you.  It's really beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh it's nothing.  I knew it.  I told Roberto "He's very good that little Frenchman, very good".  I lost my title but I won a watch! JOHANA has opened her package.  It's a big plate with a text engraved on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it a poem?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's the recipe for spaghetti "Frutti del mare". (to Jacques) You see I was right in getting you out here.  You're a world champion, my friend! JACQUES has opened the last small package.  It's a measuring tape.  He looks at it without understanding. ENZO explains:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a measuring tape. He grabs hold of the tape and lets it roll to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see this is your record, three feet more than mine!  Looking at it from here, it doesn't look like much, does it? JACQUES looks at him without saying a word. ENZO hands him the measuring tape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your little measuring tape, my friend, it will be a nice souvenir when I beat you next. ENZO taps his shoulder and smiles. INT.  ELEVATOR ASCENDING - JACQUES - JOHANA They're locked in a long kiss.  He untucks the bottom of her shirt and slides his hands under it. INT.  HOTEL ROOM - JACQUES - JOHANA - TWILIGHT They're in bed, making love in their fashion.  Moonlight shines in the silver sea.  In the background are the lights of the bay of TAORMINA. LATER JACQUES is in bed with JOHANA.  They are both asleep. Suddenly, he sits up, as he always does after his recurrent dream. He's wide awake, looks over at her sleeping.  She sleeps peacefully like a baby.  Quietly, gently, he eases out of bed and walks to the open window. He stands on the balcony, staring at the sea.  Then in the distance in the moonlight, a dolphin leaps out of the water, once, twice, a third time. JACQUES laughs and goes back to the bed where he sits down next to JOHANA.  She is still sound asleep. EXT.  HOTEL - PIER - NIGHT JACQUES quickly gets into one of his diving suits.  He puts on his flippers.  The dolphin is still jumping in and out of the water.  JACQUES jumps off the pier and swims over to her. INT.  JACQUES' HOTEL ROOM - NIGHT JOHANA rolls over and feels the bed in her sleep. JACQUES' absence wakes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques? She gets up and walks over to the balcony.  She doesn't see anything. EXT.  PIER - NIGHT JOHANA walks down the pier and notices the little pile of clothes JACQUES has left behind.  She looks around but still can't see anything.  She decides to sit next to the pile of clothes, and waits, her eyes riveted to the sea. EXT.  PIER - DAWN The sky has just begun to light up again.  JOHANA is still sitting next to the pile of clothes. She is wearing JACQUES' sweater.  She looks sad, yet serene.  The look of a woman who has been thinking over the situation and who has made up her mind. Tired, JACQUES swims back to the pier.  It looks as if he has come out of nowhere. He is exhausted.  He takes off his flippers and gets up onto the pier in front of JOHANA.  He looks at her, a little surprised to find her there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing here? She answers in a far away voice, with the same serene sadness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to leave, Jacques. Dripping with water, he sits down next to her.  His face is drawn from fatigue.  She continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going back home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because one shouldn't fall in love with creatures from the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not from the sea... I don't understand what you're talking about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes you do.  You know exactly what I'm talking about.  You're afraid I want to hold onto you, and I do, but you're not ready... at least not for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it's not true, I feel good with you... It feels right... She looks at him for a moment, then takes his face in her hands and rests it on her bosom, as if a small child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to get back to the hotel... and get my suitcase packed. INT.  TRAIN STATION - JACQUES - JOHANA - DAY The train station faces the sea.  JACQUES and JOHANA are standing on the platform, amid others.  In the distance we hear the rumble and whistle of a train. JOHANA gets on the train.  The station master blows his whistle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will... will we see each other again? JOHANA'S eyes are filled with tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take good care of yourself, Jacques. The train starts pulling out of the station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where can I call you?  Johana, tell me where can I call you? JOHANA doesn't answer.  JACQUES stands helplessly in the station, his eyes filled with tears. INT.  ENZO'S ROOM - DAY ENZO opens the door of his suite.  His hair is messed up, he's got "sheet prints" on his face and is wearing the top of a diving suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I come in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem, I enjoy talking in my sleep. ENZO walks back into the apartment and crashes on the bed. He's lying on his stomach.  JACQUES walks in and lets himself drop in a chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wake me up at 11:00. ENZO closes his eyes.  JACQUES looks over at the clock, it says 11:25.  JACQUES doesn't say anything and stares blankly out of the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmmm!  Something wrong? JACQUES doesn't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it the girl? JACQUES stares out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did she leave? No answer.  ENZO gets up and sits on the side of the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!  I'm going to take care of you! I've got this job, on an oil rig, no sweat!  I'm taking you along... Come on!  Get your bags packed!  You're coming with me, I tell you! He pats him on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll make a great team, the two of us.  You'll see! EXT.  OIL DRILLING PLATFORM - AT SEA - DAY The platform shines in the morning light. There are several stories of crew housing and offices above the deck.  Long steel legs disappear into the swelling slate-gray ocean.  We hear WHOP-WHOP-WHOP of a helicopter. EXT.  HELICOPTER - PLATFORM The helicopter is landing.  Crewmen rush to secure it to the oil rig's deck.  Doors open and two passengers get off:  JACQUES and ENZO.  They each carry a duffel bag of personal belongings.  They're both wearing fluorescent diving suits. The DRILLING SUPERINTENDENT comes to meet them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mayol, Molinari...? They nod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've been waiting for you for three days.  Goddamnit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that the way you talk to the best diver in the world...?  And to his friend Jacques Mayol! The SUPERINTENDENT smiles sourly, and gestures to a crewman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show them their quarters. Five minutes later, JACQUES and ENZO are following the crewman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't like us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what!?  His job is to hand out the paychecks.  And he does that very well, let me tell you. INT.  DIVING CAPSULE - DAY The diving capsule, suspended by cables, begins its descent through a trap door in the deck.  It plunges into the sea. The three men in the capsule are:  JACQUES, ENZO and the tough looking CAPSULE COMMANDER NOIREUTER, who is much too professional for ENZO'S tastes. ENZO watches through a porthole while the COMMANDER concentrates on the control console.  He runs through a checklist of systems.  JACQUES responds with a "check" as he verifies each one.  ENZO is already bored and fed up by the procedures. JACQUES is lost in thought, they don't look cheerful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You still thinking about her? JACQUES doesn't answer.  ENZO goes on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't think about her anymore!  Let me tell you, you're just making yourself unhappy!  There are so many women in the world! He takes a cigarette from a pouch in his diving suit and stares at NOIREUTER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plenty of women everywhere right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smoking is absolutely forbidden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It isn't lit yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't even carry cigarettes on board!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen we're not supposed to piss either but that doesn't stop you from carrying "it" on board?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rules are the rules.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... What's your name again?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noireuter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And where did you say you were from?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't say... (contemptuous) Brussels! ENZO smiles sardonically, shaking his head very slowly. The COMMANDER'S answer explains it all. INT.  DRILLING PLATFORM - CONTROL ROOM - DAY A technician is overlooking the capsule descent on a video screen. The SUPERINTENDENT watches over the technician's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're at 450 feet. INT.  DIVING CAPSULE - DAY ENZO, a cigarette dangling from his lips, looks through the porthole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I was seventeen, I loved her so much I tried to die for her.  Two years later I couldn't even remember her name!  Let me tell you, time erases everything!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to erase anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'd rather think about it and make yourself miserable?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I give you this.  You're stubborn... Dumb, but stubborn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. INT.  CAPSULE - DAY The technician fiddles with a few knobs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Minus 800 feet.  End of descent. INT.  DIVING CAPSULE The diving capsule ends its descent.  The COMMANDER turns to ENZO and JACQUES who is still staring out the porthole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have enough air for 15 minutes. ENZO bursts out laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's with the voice?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's nothing.  It's just the helium, because of the air pressure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And... does the voice come back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For others, yes... For you, who knows?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try speaking to me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't find this funny.  We were having a serious conversation. ENZO and JACQUES burst out laughing.  They keep these same voice till the end of the scene. ENZO pulls out a tiny silver flask out of his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, give me your finger. ENZO taps a drop onto JACQUES' finger, then on his own. Then NOIREUTER blows up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that alcohol?  Are you out of your mind?  Alcohol is strictly forbidden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!  D'you have any other complaints?  Just make a list and we'll stick it on the porthole! Okay? ENZO pours a second drop on his own finger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on, suck your finger. JACQUES hesitates.  ENZO has no qualms about it and sucks his own finger.  NOIREUTER is petrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you crazy?  At this pressure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's very deep down here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, suck your finger, you'll be seeing mermaids everywhere! JACQUES, convinced sucks his finger too.  ENZO smiles. The alcohol has an immediate effect on them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A thousand commanders and we get a Belgian from Alcoholic's Anonymous. UNDERWATER ENZO gets out of the diving capsule, head first. He is connected to the capsule by a number of cables. JACQUES, who follows him, gets completely tangled up in them.  They are both hilariously drunk. INT.  DRILLING PLATFORM - CONTROL ROOM The SUPERINTENDENT hears them laughing through the control room speakers.  He flips a communication switch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you hear me?  What's going on? (to the technician) Are you sure you're on the right channel? The technician nods back to him. UNDERWATER The two divers have gotten to the spot they are supposed to be working on.  They have their arms around each other and are dancing. NOIREUTER watches them through the porthole.  He shakes his head in complete disbelief. INT.  CONTROL ROOM We hear the two friends humming the tune of a Viennese waltz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If those guys are playing a radio down there they'd just better watch out!! INT.  JOHANA'S APARTMENT SALLY is talking away, pointing around the apartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... And if we repaint the walls, we'll need new curtains, you put the painters on you Visa and I'll do the curtains on American Express... for the couch there's Bloomingdales... or are you still over your limit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Way past it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does that have a hidden meaning?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  I'm just depressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look it too.  You haven't been working out, you haven't been taking your vitamins!  You haven't been drinking your herbs, you haven't been...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, I know!  I'm a terrible person... (after a beat) It's... I'm so damn, damn sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it honey... the frenchy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think I should have stayed? Don't you think maybe I should have stayed?  I've been a jerk, right? (then, emphatically) I should have stayed!  I was supposed to be in love... I was in love!  I am in love, why did I act like a bitch?  He went swimming. All the man did was go swimming!  I must be crazy.  It was too good to be true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vitamins, exercise, herb tea... and see a doctor, will ya? INT.  DOCTOR'S OFFICE - JOHANA - DAY The doctor enters with a folder, speaks to JOHANA DOCTOR Well Miss Cross, herbs aren't going to do the trick this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's serious, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think so.  You're pregnant... Congratulations!  If that's in order? JOHANA breaks into a wide grin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's in order!  Thank you.  Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think it's me you have to thank. INT.  DUFFY'S OFFICE - DUFFY - DAY DUFFY is at his desk.  His lunch is spread out in front of him.  Outside the window, the window-washers are eating their lunch too.  JOHANA hurries in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good afternoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I came to make a clean breast of everything... the whole business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  Of course.  Very wise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember when I went to Italy and canceled the policy on the new stadium.  Well, we weren't being cheated by the Mafia or anybody except maybe by me... (she sees the window- washers) ... Do they come for lunch everyday? I really went on my own business, to see a man that I happen to be in love with... and I'm glad I did it, but I'm sorry about the policy and I'll be happy to make up the money the company didn't get... of course just now I don't have... (she checks a note she's holding) One million, four hundred and ten thousand dollars.  But if you were to dock my salary, say, twenty dollars a week, in a few hundred years we'd be even... and I think this is where you fire me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right.  You're fired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will that interfere with my getting maternity leave?  I'm pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Italian, I presume?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  He's French, he was just in Italy for the competition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He seems to have won it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, isn't it wonderful?  I'm so happy.  I'll bet I'm the happiest pregnant fired person in the world! She starts to leave... calls out to the window-washers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bon appetit and Adieu! INT.  JOHANA'S APARTMENT - NIGHT JOHANA stares out of the bay window of her Manhattan apartment.  Hesitant, she walks around her telephone. Finally she makes up her mind, picks up her address book and dials the number.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me... Johana. INT.  JACQUES' APARTMENT JACQUES is on the telephone, in front of a little window overlooking the sea.  He is very glad to hear her voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you? INT.  JOHANA'S APARTMENT - NIGHT JOHANA I got fired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... That's funny... I had this job with Enzo... we got fired too. JOHANA'S face lights up with a huge smile.
direction.name: direction
