direction.raw_text: : LATER JOHANA is still on the phone, sitting in front of the bay window.  Day is dawning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's getting light out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, it's getting dark. JOHANA smiles.  She stretches, lies down on the carpeted floor.  JACQUES seems to have gone through all topics of conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been thinking about you a lot, you know... JOHANA is by now completely stretched out on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So have I. (a beat) ... Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm still here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then, talk to me some more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... It's hard you know.  You're so far away and I don't know what else to say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then, tell me a story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... Ah!  A story? He turns around and sits on the window sill, his feet dangling in mid air. He looks at the sea, seeking inspiration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know how it is? (starting again) Do you know what you're supposed to do to meet a mermaid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... tell me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You go down to the bottom of the sea, where the water isn't even blue anymore, where the sky is only a memory... and you float there, quietly, quietly and stay there... and you decide that you will die for them... Only then do they start coming out.  They come and greet you and they judge the love you have for them... If it's sincere.  If it's pure... They will be with you and take you away forever. JOHANA listens with the abandon of a child being put to sleep. INT.  JACQUES' ROOM - ANTIBES The sun hits the roof tops.  The sea is sparkling. The phone rings on the window sill.  JACQUES answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me again. JACQUES smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm being a pain, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Not at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely positive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.  In that case... I'm at the airport in Nice. JACQUES doesn't know what to say.  He looks around him, can't figure out what to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay... huh, I'll be right over. INT.  AIRPORT - DAY JOHANA is standing in front of the airport. JACQUES sees her.  They smile shyly at each other. EXT.  STREET - NICE - OPPOSITE THE NEGRESCO HOTEL JACQUES and JOHANA are sitting in the back of a taxi.  The driver stops in front of the hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Carlton!  Enjoy your siesta. JACQUES and JOHANA look at each other. INT.  HOTEL ROOM - JACQUES - JOHANA - DAY The room is in semi-darkness, despite the blazing sunlight coming through cracks in the shutters.  JACQUES and JOHANA are making love.  JACQUES is on top of her, his whole body covered in sweat.  The rumpled sheets and the movements of their bodies suggest the movements of the sea.  ALL SOUNDS are disproportionate and slightly distorted, they are underwater... ALL JOHANA'S reluctance has vanished.  Both of them act like people who have never felt anything like this before. A certain astonishment at the depth of their feeling.  An increasing freedom.  All the muscles of their bodies stretch to their limits. JACQUES, progressively, finds himself disappearing.  His image dissolves point by point... disintegrates into unbroken blue... The effect creates the impression of someone melting, the screen is now totally blue. A thin, HIGH-PITCHED SOUND. From the bottom of the image, a tiny pinpoint starts TOWARD the CAMERA.  It is JACQUES, naked, swimming out of the deep blue ocean toward the light as if he were coming out of a dive.  He comes CLOSER and CLOSER to the CAMERA... Until his head almost touches the lens... A sudden DEAFENING NOISE... and we find JACQUES on top of JOHANA.  He looks down at her, speechless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you okay? After a long beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I think I love you. INT.  APARTMENT BUILDING - ANTIBES - DAY JACQUES and JOHANA step out of the elevator of a 19th century building. JACQUES is carrying her suitcases.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did you take me to the hotel, if you live here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll understand. JACQUES rings the door bell and sticks his key in the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone in there? JACQUES nods and pushes the door open with the bags he's carrying.  They enter a huge, very old apartment filled with models and paintings of boats. JACQUES leads JOHANA to the other end of the apartment. INT.  BATHROOM - ON UNCLE LOUIS (SORT OF) It's a huge old-fashioned bathroom.  The centerpiece is a deep ancient bathtub on faded gild feet.  There's a rippling shadow of a body under the bath water. JOHANA gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be afraid.  It's my Uncle... Louis. He goes to the tub and pinches the end of a tube.  UNCLE LOUIS, underwater, has been breathing through it.  LOUIS' head pops out of the water, furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Assassin!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Louis, this is my friend Johana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you buy the cassettes?  The Wagner, the Berlioz?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I brought Johana to meet you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you crazy?  I have no use for a woman!  Since my accident.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no.  Johana is visiting me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bonjour Monsieur... Louis. (she looks to Jacques)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Louis.  He's a 75 year old amazing guy, isn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm very pleased to meet you, Uncle Louis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you bring the cassettes, the Wagner, the Berlioz? (pointing to Jacques) This idiot never listens to anything I say.  Sometimes I wonder if he isn't deaf. LOUIS climbs out of the bathtub, and pulls on a bathrobe. Behind him he's pulling two insulated wires out of the bathtub.  We see that they're connected to small underwater speakers.  As they surface, incredibly LOUD MUSIC BLASTS:  the finale of the "1812 Overture", (trumpets, timpani, cannons, etc...) The sound fills the room, the apartment, and probably all of ANTIBES. INT.  DINING ROOM - JACQUES - JOHANA - LOUIS - LATER The three of them are at the table.  There are a few scraps on their plates on a threadbare lace tablecloth. Incredibly LOUD SYMPHONIC MUSIC is PLAYING.  LOUIS is as deaf as a fence post. Everyone has to scream over the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you from, Henrietta?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johana... New York.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of name is that?  To be named after a city?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't hear too well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said I was from New York.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That explains it!  The best lays are from New York!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Louis!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no.  It's true.  When I was in New York, oh boy! (to Johana) Before my accident, you understand? (then back to Jacques) JACQUES stands up and lowers the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Louis!  Johana is my friend. She's come to stay with me for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.  That way I'll see more of you... Where are you going to stay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In my apartment?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's my apartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liar!  Thief!  Torturer!  When you were an orphan I nursed you at my breast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Louis, we have a guest!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to put a lock on the telephone. (them calming down, to Johana) Did you bring the cassettes? INT.  BEDROOM - JACQUES - JOHANA JACQUES' room looks like a diving equipment storage room with a bed in it.  JACQUES notices JOHANA'S gaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think it'll be all right? You'll be comfortable here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's going to be... interesting. EXT.  PORT OF ANTIBES - DAY JACQUES, JOHANA and ROBERTO are waiting at the port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... It's not like him to be late. Of course sometimes he doesn't show up at all.  Once in Capri, he...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We get the picture, Roberto. (looks over her shoulder) Jacques, I think Louis needs help. JACQUES turns around.  UNCLE LOUIS is a few yards behind them at a fish stand on the dock.  He's holding up an eel and screaming at the fishmonger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two dollars for this!  This fish wasn't caught.  It died of cancer! JACQUES shrugs his shoulders and gives up on the idea of interfering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here he comes! A speed boat races along the water.  It's a beautiful highly-varnished mahogany Riva.  It races into the port. Standing at the helm, looking like Christopher Columbus his hair brushed back by the wind, is ENZO. Next to him hanging on to the windscreen is an impressive six foot, dark haired beauty.  She has a scarf over her hair.  She wears a purple leather micro-mini with a cerise halter top and her ruby fingernails are three inches long. If she ever actually would get cast in a movie, she'd make Raquel Welch hide in shame.  Her stage name is BONITA MARIPOSA. ENZO kills the THROTTLE, swings the speedboat into a perfect landing at the dock.  ROBERTO takes the lines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jacques!  Johana!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo! During all of this, everyone's attention is actually on BONITA who is tugging at her long black hair.  They're all awestruck except for ROBERTO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "That"!  This is not a "that"... This is Bonita Mariposa, the famous Spanish actress. (whispering to Bonita) ... Who is going to be careful with the varnish... (back to Roberto) And who has come to spend a few days with us. (and very quickly) Where's Mamma?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have eight hours before she gets here. ENZO glances at his watch and sighs with relief.  BONITA says hello to JACQUES, kisses JOHANA. INT.  LIVING ROOM IN JACQUES' APARTMENT - DAY Loud classical music booms from the stereo.  The noise pins JACQUES, ENZO and ROBERTO to their chairs. UNCLE LOUIS gets a bottle of whiskey and serves everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's really going totally deaf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not as deaf as you are blind, my boy!  You take care of your eyes, I'll take care of my ears!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry Uncle Louis. UNCLE LOUIS pours him a whiskey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, drink up, my boy!  It might just save us from your bullshit. The bottle is empty.  UNCLE LOUIS goes to the kitchen. JACQUES turns down the music, and finally hears the bell which has been ringing.  JACQUES opens the apartment door: it's Professor LAWRENCE.  Suit and tie and carrying a bottle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you could come.  I want you to meet Enzo. ENZO and LAWRENCE shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're the famous Enzo Molinari?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the flesh.  I have that honor! INT.  BATHROOM - NIGHT JOHANA comes into the bathroom, closes the door, cutting down the blaring music.  The paint is peeling off the ceiling. BONITA is standing under a 40 watt lamp, putting on make- up in front of JACQUES' cracked shaving mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to live here permanently?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Maybe, if Jacques will let me fix up the place a little. JOHANA walks over to the mirror and watches BONITA put on her make-up like a professional.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's shy, not like Enzo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  Not like Enzo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think, he's really nice... He's a funny guy... sometimes even very moving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I'm pregnant, Bonita! BONITA stops working on her make-up and looks pensively at JOHANA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you going to keep it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you should talk to him about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't... I just don't know how to... BONITA looks at her with the same pensive look. JOHANA goes on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking of something kinda stupid last night.  You know those women in the greek mythology that made love with the Gods.  Take Leda for example, sleeping with Jupiter, who came to earth as a swan... Well, can you imagine Leda announcing to her swan "You're going to be a father, my little chick-a-dee"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But your man isn't quite a God!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Probably not, but I still don't have the nerve to tell him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you're going to have to tell him, sometime! Unconvinced, JOHANA nods.  She changes the subject.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you...?  Do you love Enzo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very much, I think. (a beat) But, there's going to be a problem. EXT.  TERRACE OF RESTAURANT - NIGHT The "problem":  MAMMA MOLINARI sits between ENZO and ROBERTO, looking like a malevolent storm cloud, staring across at BONITA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mamma, calimari fritti... Zuppa de pesci.  Sono buoni.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.  I'm not hungry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mamma, Bonita is an actress like Sophia Loren, Anna Magnani...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sarah Bernardt.  I sing too... a hell of a Carmen.  Want to hear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thank you. There's an interminable awkward silence.  Then UNCLE LOUIS at last finds his way to the table.  JACQUES who is too grateful for the interruption springs to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Louis, you remember Enzo's mother Signora Molinari from Amorgos?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The whale!  How could I forget? Always was something fishy about that woman! MAMMA MOLINARI is having trouble breathing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were Italians doing living in Greece anyway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Louis, we were French!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's different!  What's the matter with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mamma, pesce di spada? All of them are gasping for air, trying so hard not to laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, whale!  Can you pass down the squids? They all burst out laughing. EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT AT SEA - DAY The diving platform is out.  The competition has begun. ENZO is at the gueuse, getting ready to dive.  ROBERTO works around him busily. BONITA on deck above him is making little gestures of encouragement.  ENZO isn't amused. Other competitors watch from the Committee Boat. ENZO turns the handle on the gueuse, plunges into the water. Professor LAWRENCE, taking notes, stands a few feet away. UNDERWATER - ON ENZO He dives down, further and further down.  He approaches the two medics in aqualungs at the control point (210 feet). They move toward him. EXT.  DIVING PLATFORM - ENZO Surfacing.  Assistants help him onto the platform. ROBERTO pulls off his fins.  ENZO rips off his mask.  He looks furious.  He tosses the depth plaque (which proves he is qualified) back into the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A shit dive. He looks around angrily for an official.  Sees NOVELLI.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those goddamned frogmen doctors waiting around at 200 feet they just kill your concentration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're required by law.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no law down there!  The only law is what your lungs can take. (to the next diver) ... Have fun!  They waiting for you down there, to take the temperature of your ass. He keeps on walking across the boat, runs into JACQUES, who's just about to begin his yoga preparation. JACQUES sees ENZO'S expression, looks concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anybody can have a bad day!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've had many... when the sea doesn't want you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's never the sea!  It's Roberto, Mamma, that stupid actress... Oh shit!  Jacques, what do you know? Go do your Hindu exercises and don't break my balls! ENZO stamps into one of the cabins. INT.  JACQUES' APARTMENT - NIGHT JOHANA is reading a child birth catalog.  She throws it away upside down, as soon as she hears JACQUES approaching.  JACQUES comes in and sits opposite her.  He seems bitter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, how was it? In an involuntary gesture, JACQUES flips through the catalog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo had a bad day. JOHANA wonders if JACQUES will understand the presence of the baby magazine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't dive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll try again tomorrow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... it didn't feel right.  I'm going to bed.  I'm tired. He goes away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You forgot your magazine! He hasn't heard. JACQUES goes to the bedroom, and throws himself on the bed. JOHANA looks as if she had wished he'd put two and two together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT AT SEA - DAY ENZO bursts out of the water.  He rips off his face mask, throws it on the diving platform, roaring with pleasure. He tosses the depth plague to ROBERTO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let them try. INT.  JACQUES' APARTMENT - DAY JOHANA opens the apartment door.  BONITA is standing there, a suitcase in one hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to say goodbye, Johana. They kiss each other goodbye. JOHANA is very uncomfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're leaving?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... (she hands her a note) Could you please give this to Enzo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. BONITA grabs the note back and tears it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's no use... Just tell him I said goodbye... And give him a kiss for me, Okay? The two women hug again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bonita, you shouldn't be discouraged so easily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have the strength to fight off la Mamma... Anyway who wants to spend their whole life waiting at the end of a pier. BONITA rests her hand on JOHANA'S stomach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you tell him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet... I'm waiting for the right moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... You take care of yourself, Johana. BONITA smiles at her and disappears down the stairs. EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT - DOCKING - DAY Officials, NOVELLI, LAWRENCE, ROBERTO and of course ENZO disembark.  There is a lot of excitement on the dock. Everyone has already heard the news. People swarm around ENZO. LAWRENCE spots JACQUES in the crowd, and goes to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He really was unbelievable, 328 feet, deeper than the world record... (then eagerly) ... And, Jacques!  He held his breath for four minutes and fifty seconds!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good... I guess I have tomorrow's work cut out for me as Enzo would say...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must be very careful, Jacques. At these depths, to hold your breath for over five minutes is... You'd really be pushing it.  I think it's very, very dangerous. JACQUES sees ENZO being carried past on the shoulders of the crowd.  He ignores LAWRENCE, runs beside ENZO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enzo, Enzo!  Congratulations! EXT.  AWARD CEREMONY - NIGHT ENZO (in answer to the crowd's applause) Thank you, thank you very much! ENZO and NOVELLI stand on a little stage facing the crowd. ENZO is holding a gold trophy, waving to friends in the audience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Now I'm sure you've heard that some people have suggested it is too dangerous for us to continue. Dangerous, because we don't know how to measure the physiological consequences of this type of dive and also because the scuba divers are not used to going down below 300 feet. While the attentive crowd listens to NOVELLI, ENZO is gesturing to ROBERTO, explaining what appetizers he wants from the cocktail trays. The crowd laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, we polled the free divers and they insist that the competition continue! There's wild applause.  ENZO lifts the trophy over his head, smiles like a champ and yells into the microphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good luck to you all! EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT - DAY ENZO and ROBERTO are on the front deck watching the divers. A German diver comes up to the surface, empty handed. ENZO smiles. The Tahitian comes out of the water in a semi-coma.  The doctors carry him away.  Once he's sure that the diver is out of danger, ENZO smiles again. A whole team of Japanese walk over to the diving platform. The team consists of one diver and six assistants, three of them playing music to help the diver concentrate.  The diver wears a white wet suit with a red circle on his forehead.  He is concentrating very hard, so much that ENZO walks over to him to make sure he's okay.  The Japanese diver concentrates with such strength that he faints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fabulous, what a dive, huh? ROBERTO smiles. The diver from the Philippines stands at the end of the diving platform.  He concentrates for a moment then gives up and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's right.  What's the point of knocking yourself out? INT.  BEDROOM - JACQUES - JOHANA - NIGHT They're in bed, side by side, both of them half asleep. The only light in the room comes from the open windows. He rolls over and watches her sleep, looking down at her adoringly.  He slips off the chain with the gold coin. Slowly, holding the chain, he runs the coin gently over her body, stops at the level of her stomach and lets it rest there.  She opens her eyes and looks at him, wondering if he senses something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm putting you on the coin... Your essence... That way you'll always be with me when I dive. She smiles, closes her eyes.  He swings the coin over her face gently, some kind of private ceremony.  She looks just a little intimidated. The coin is now dangling in front of her mouth.  She hesitates then opens her mouth, JACQUES lets the coin slide into it. EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT - DAY JACQUES walks up to the diving platform. LAWRENCE has fixed scientific equipment on his chest. JACQUES wets and slowly puts them on. ENZO watches from the deck, his expression has changed. JOHANA, on the deck also, opposite ENZO, watches a little worried.  JACQUES concentrates then releases the gueuse and lets himself disappear under the water. UNDERWATER JACQUES dives down very fast.  The control takes place at 200 feet, the doctors check him and let him go.  He continues his descent, it's getting darker and darker around him. The gueuse stops at the level of the underwater platform, just below the diver, who swims over to him in a sea of bubbles from his oxygen bottles.  He asks JACQUES if he is alright, JACQUES nods and gives him a huge smile before swimming off, downwards! The diver realizes and starts after him.  He grabs JACQUES by one of his fins and pulls him back to the round platform.  JACQUES lets go of the balloon. The diver panics.  JACQUES slowly motions that everything is fine and slowly paddles up to the surface. EXT.  COMMITTEE BOAT - DAY The boat's huge stop watch indicates min:  4:50, then 5:00, then 5:10.  JACQUES has been down there for over 5 minutes. JOHANA is worried sick.  ENZO doesn't know what to make of it and LAWRENCE feels completely helpless.  The stopwatch indicates 5:20, then 5:25 and JACQUES, half unconscious, brakes through the surface of the water. JOHANA screams and cries with joy when she sees him.  The crowd applauds.  ENZO is somber. NOVELLI takes the plaque from JACQUES' hands and turns to the crowd.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (bluffing, with his mouth full of sandwich)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (loud, as if speaking to a deaf man)
dialogue.name: dialogue
